reviewText: Great product, service and I would recommend it to friends.
Anything that has Gillian Anderson is sure to be as the title of show says Fantastic. She is a wonderfully seasoned actress that she keeps on getting more amazing as time goes on.

I was really surprised by this show.  I thought it was going to be a really shallow, cheesy, type of futuristic show but I'm a big fan of futuristic media, so I thought what the heck, and I rented it. Man!  It really was escellent.  Gillian Anderson was well chosen, and very nice to look at. The interviews were done with highly respected authorities, and the overall documentary was really kind of hip.  As the previous viewer mentioned a must have for science fiction fans.
